55  const string RinexObsHeader::versionString = "RINEX VERSION / TYPE";
56  const string RinexObsHeader::runByString = "PGM / RUN BY / DATE";
57  const string RinexObsHeader::commentString = "COMMENT";
58  const string RinexObsHeader::markerNameString = "MARKER NAME";
59  const string RinexObsHeader::markerNumberString = "MARKER NUMBER";
60  const string RinexObsHeader::observerString = "OBSERVER / AGENCY";
61  const string RinexObsHeader::receiverString = "REC # / TYPE / VERS";
62  const string RinexObsHeader::antennaTypeString = "ANT # / TYPE";
63  const string RinexObsHeader::antennaPositionString = "APPROX POSITION XYZ";
64  const string RinexObsHeader::antennaOffsetString = "ANTENNA: DELTA H/E/N";
65  const string RinexObsHeader::waveFactString = "WAVELENGTH FACT L1/2";
66  const string RinexObsHeader::numObsString = "# / TYPES OF OBSERV";
67  const string RinexObsHeader::intervalString = "INTERVAL";
68  const string RinexObsHeader::firstTimeString = "TIME OF FIRST OBS";
69  const string RinexObsHeader::lastTimeString = "TIME OF LAST OBS";
70  const string RinexObsHeader::receiverOffsetString = "RCV CLOCK OFFS APPL";
71  const string RinexObsHeader::leapSecondsString = "LEAP SECONDS";
72  const string RinexObsHeader::numSatsString = "# OF SATELLITES";
73  const string RinexObsHeader::prnObsString = "PRN / # OF OBS";
74  const string RinexObsHeader::endOfHeader = "END OF HEADER";
75 
76  const unsigned int RinexObsType::C1depend=0x01;
77  const unsigned int RinexObsType::L1depend=0x02;
78  const unsigned int RinexObsType::L2depend=0x04;
79  const unsigned int RinexObsType::P1depend=0x08;
80  const unsigned int RinexObsType::P2depend=0x10;
81  const unsigned int RinexObsType::EPdepend=0x20;
82  const unsigned int RinexObsType::PSdepend=0x40;
83 
84  const RinexObsType RinexObsHeader::UN("UN", "Unknown or Invalid", "unknown", 0);
85  const RinexObsType RinexObsHeader::L1("L1", "L1 Carrier Phase", "L1 cycles",
86  RinexObsType::L1depend);
87  const RinexObsType RinexObsHeader::L2("L2", "L2 Carrier Phase", "L2 cycles",
88  RinexObsType::L2depend);
89  const RinexObsType RinexObsHeader::C1("C1", "C/A-code pseudorange", "meters",
90  RinexObsType::C1depend);
91  const RinexObsType RinexObsHeader::C2("C2", "L2C-code pseudorange", "meters", 0);
92  const RinexObsType RinexObsHeader::P1("P1", "Pcode L1 pseudorange", "meters",
93  RinexObsType::P1depend);
94  const RinexObsType RinexObsHeader::P2("P2", "Pcode L2 pseudorange", "meters",
95  RinexObsType::P2depend);
96  const RinexObsType RinexObsHeader::D1("D1", "Doppler Frequency L1", "Hz", 0);
97  const RinexObsType RinexObsHeader::D2("D2", "Doppler Frequency L2", "Hz", 0);
98  const RinexObsType RinexObsHeader::S1("S1", "Signal-to-Noise L1", "dB-Hz", 0);
99  const RinexObsType RinexObsHeader::S2("S2", "Signal-to-Noise L2", "dB-Hz", 0);
100  const RinexObsType RinexObsHeader::T1("T1", "Transit 150 MHz", "meters", 0);
101  const RinexObsType RinexObsHeader::T2("T2", "Transit 400 MHz", "meters", 0);
102  // v 2.11
103  const RinexObsType RinexObsHeader::C5("C5", "L5C-code pseudorange", "meters", 0);
104  const RinexObsType RinexObsHeader::L5("L5", "L5 Carrier Phase", "L5 cycles", 0);
105  const RinexObsType RinexObsHeader::D5("D5", "Doppler Frequency L5", "Hz", 0);
106  const RinexObsType RinexObsHeader::S5("S5", "Signal-to-Noise L5", "dB-Hz", 0);
107  // Galileo only
108  const RinexObsType RinexObsHeader::C6("C6", "E6-code pseudorange", "meters", 0);
109  const RinexObsType RinexObsHeader::L6("L6", "E6 Carrier Phase", "L6 cycles", 0);
110  const RinexObsType RinexObsHeader::D6("D6", "Doppler Frequency E6", "Hz", 0);
111  const RinexObsType RinexObsHeader::S6("S6", "Signal-to-Noise E6", "dB-Hz", 0);
112 
113  const RinexObsType RinexObsHeader::C7("C7", "E5b-code pseudorange", "meters", 0);
114  const RinexObsType RinexObsHeader::L7("L7", "E5b Carrier Phase", "L7 cycles", 0);
115  const RinexObsType RinexObsHeader::D7("D7", "Doppler Frequency E5b", "Hz", 0);
116  const RinexObsType RinexObsHeader::S7("S7", "Signal-to-Noise E5b", "dB-Hz", 0);
117 
118  const RinexObsType RinexObsHeader::C8("C8", "E5a+b-code pseudorange", "meters", 0);
119  const RinexObsType RinexObsHeader::L8("L8", "E5a+b Carrier Phase", "L8 cycles", 0);
120  const RinexObsType RinexObsHeader::D8("D8", "Doppler Frequency E5a+b","Hz", 0);
121  const RinexObsType RinexObsHeader::S8("S8", "Signal-to-Noise E5a+b", "dB-Hz", 0);

123  RinexObsType sot[29] =
124  {
125  RinexObsHeader::UN,
126  RinexObsHeader::L1, RinexObsHeader::L2,
127  RinexObsHeader::C1, RinexObsHeader::C2,
128  RinexObsHeader::P1, RinexObsHeader::P2,
129  RinexObsHeader::D1, RinexObsHeader::D2,
130  RinexObsHeader::S1, RinexObsHeader::S2,
131  RinexObsHeader::T1, RinexObsHeader::T2,
132  RinexObsHeader::C5, RinexObsHeader::L5, RinexObsHeader::D5, RinexObsHeader::S5,
133  RinexObsHeader::C6, RinexObsHeader::L6, RinexObsHeader::D6, RinexObsHeader::S6,
134  RinexObsHeader::C7, RinexObsHeader::L7, RinexObsHeader::D7, RinexObsHeader::S7,
135  RinexObsHeader::C8, RinexObsHeader::L8, RinexObsHeader::D8, RinexObsHeader::S8
136  };

138  // Warning: the size of the above sot array needs to be put
139  // in this initializer.
140  const std::vector<RinexObsType> RinexObsHeader::StandardRinexObsTypes(sot,sot+29);

142  std::vector<RinexObsType> RinexObsHeader::RegisteredRinexObsTypes
143  = RinexObsHeader::StandardRinexObsTypes;
144 
145  void RinexObsHeader::reallyPutRecord(FFStream& ffs) const
146  throw(std::exception, FFStreamError, StringException)
147  {
148  RinexObsStream& strm = dynamic_cast<RinexObsStream&>(ffs);
149 
150  strm.header = *this;
151 
152  unsigned long allValid;
153  if (version == 2.0) allValid = allValid20;
154  else if (version == 2.1) allValid = allValid21;
155  else if (version == 2.11) allValid = allValid211;
156  else
157  {
158  FFStreamError err("Unknown RINEX version: " + asString(version,2));
159  err.addText("Make sure to set the version correctly.");
160  GPSTK_THROW(err);
161  }
162 
163  if ((valid & allValid) != allValid)
164  {
165  FFStreamError err("Incomplete or invalid header.");
166  err.addText("Make sure you set all header valid bits for all of the available data.");
167  GPSTK_THROW(err);
168  }
169 
170  try
171  {
172  WriteHeaderRecords(strm);
173  }
174  catch(FFStreamError& e)
175  {
176  GPSTK_RETHROW(e);
177  }
178  catch(StringException& e)
179  {
180  GPSTK_RETHROW(e);
181  }
182 
183  } // end RinexObsHeader::reallyPutRecord
184 
185 
186  // this function computes the number of valid header records which WriteHeaderRecords will write
187  int RinexObsHeader::NumberHeaderRecordsToBeWritten(void) const throw()
188  {
189  int n=0;
190  if(valid & RinexObsHeader::versionValid) n++;
191  if(valid & RinexObsHeader::runByValid) n++;
192  if(valid & RinexObsHeader::markerNameValid) n++;
193  if(valid & RinexObsHeader::observerValid) n++;
194  if(valid & RinexObsHeader::receiverValid) n++;
195  if(valid & RinexObsHeader::antennaTypeValid) n++;
196  if(valid & RinexObsHeader::antennaPositionValid) n++;
197  if(valid & RinexObsHeader::antennaOffsetValid) n++;
198  if(valid & RinexObsHeader::waveFactValid) {
199  n++;
200  if(extraWaveFactList.size()) n += 1 + (extraWaveFactList.size()-1)/7;
201  }
202  if(valid & RinexObsHeader::obsTypeValid) n += 1 + (obsTypeList.size()-1)/9;
203  if(valid & RinexObsHeader::intervalValid) n++;
204  if(valid & RinexObsHeader::firstTimeValid) n++;
205  if(valid & RinexObsHeader::lastTimeValid) n++;
206  if(valid & RinexObsHeader::markerNumberValid) n++;
207  if(valid & RinexObsHeader::receiverOffsetValid) n++;
208  if(valid & RinexObsHeader::leapSecondsValid) n++;
209  if(valid & RinexObsHeader::commentValid) n += commentList.size();
210  if(valid & RinexObsHeader::numSatsValid) n++;
211  if(valid & RinexObsHeader::prnObsValid)
212  n += numObsForSat.size() * (1+numObsForSat.begin()->second.size()/9);
213  if(valid & RinexObsHeader::endValid) n++;
214  return n;
215  }
216 
217  // this function writes all valid header records
218  void RinexObsHeader::WriteHeaderRecords(FFStream& ffs) const
219  throw(FFStreamError, StringException)
220  {
221  RinexObsStream& strm = dynamic_cast<RinexObsStream&>(ffs);
222  string line;
223  if (valid & versionValid)
224  {
225  line = rightJustify(asString(version,2), 9);
226  line += string(11, ' ');
227  if ((fileType[0] != 'O') && (fileType[0] != 'o'))
228  {
229  FFStreamError err("This isn't a Rinex Observation file: " +
230  fileType.substr(0,1));
231  GPSTK_THROW(err);
232  }
233 
234  if (system.system == RinexSatID::systemUnknown)
235  {
236  FFStreamError err("Invalid satellite system");
237  GPSTK_THROW(err);
238  }
239 
240  line += leftJustify(string("Observation"), 20);
241  std::string str;
242  str = system.systemChar();
243  str = str + " (" + system.systemString() + ")";
244  line += leftJustify(str, 20);
245  line += versionString;
246  strm << line << endl;
247  strm.lineNumber++;
248  }
249  if (valid & runByValid)
250  {
251  line = leftJustify(fileProgram,20);
252  line += leftJustify(fileAgency,20);
253  CommonTime dt;
254  SystemTime sysTime;
255  string dat = (static_cast<CivilTime>(sysTime)).printf("%04Y%02m%02d %02H%02M%02S %P");
256  line += leftJustify(dat, 20);
257  line += runByString;
258  strm << line << endl;
259  strm.lineNumber++;
260  }
261  if (valid & markerNameValid)
262  {
263  line = leftJustify(markerName, 60);
264  line += markerNameString;
265  strm << line << endl;
266  strm.lineNumber++;
267  }
268  if (valid & observerValid)
269  {
270  line = leftJustify(observer, 20);
271  line += leftJustify(agency, 40);
272  line += observerString;
273  strm << line << endl;
274  strm.lineNumber++;
275  }
276  if (valid & receiverValid)
277  {
278  line = leftJustify(recNo, 20);
279  line += leftJustify(recType, 20);
280  line += leftJustify(recVers, 20);
281  line += receiverString;
282  strm << line << endl;
283  strm.lineNumber++;
284  }
285  if (valid & antennaTypeValid)
286  {
287  line = leftJustify(antNo, 20);
288  line += leftJustify(antType, 20);
289  line += string(20, ' ');
290  line += antennaTypeString;
291  strm << line << endl;
292  strm.lineNumber++;
293  }
294  if (valid & antennaPositionValid)
295  {
296  line = rightJustify(asString(antennaPosition[0], 4), 14);
297  line += rightJustify(asString(antennaPosition[1], 4), 14);
298  line += rightJustify(asString(antennaPosition[2], 4), 14);
299  line += string(18, ' ');
300  line += antennaPositionString;
301  strm << line << endl;
302  strm.lineNumber++;
303  }
304  if (valid & antennaOffsetValid)
305  {
306  line = rightJustify(asString(antennaOffset[0], 4), 14);
307  line += rightJustify(asString(antennaOffset[1], 4), 14);
308  line += rightJustify(asString(antennaOffset[2], 4), 14);
309  line += string(18, ' ');
310  line += antennaOffsetString;
311  strm << line << endl;
312  strm.lineNumber++;
313  }
314  if (valid & waveFactValid)
315  {
316  line = rightJustify(asString<short>(wavelengthFactor[0]),6);
317  line += rightJustify(asString<short>(wavelengthFactor[1]),6);
318  line += string(48, ' ');
319  line += waveFactString;
320  strm << line << endl;
321  strm.lineNumber++;
322 
323  // handle continuation lines
324  if (!extraWaveFactList.empty())
325  {
326  vector<ExtraWaveFact>::const_iterator itr = extraWaveFactList.begin();
327 
328  while (itr != extraWaveFactList.end())
329  {
330  const int maxSatsPerLine = 7;
331  short satsWritten = 0, satsLeft = (*itr).satList.size(), satsThisLine;
332  vector<SatID>::const_iterator vecItr = (*itr).satList.begin();
333 
334  while ((vecItr != (*itr).satList.end())) {
335  if(satsWritten == 0) {
336  line = rightJustify(asString<short>((*itr).wavelengthFactor[0]),6);
337  line += rightJustify(asString<short>((*itr).wavelengthFactor[1]),6);
338  satsThisLine = (satsLeft > maxSatsPerLine ? maxSatsPerLine : satsLeft);
339  line += rightJustify(asString<short>(satsThisLine),6);
340  }
341  try {
342  line += string(3, ' ') + RinexSatID(*vecItr).toString();
343  }
344  catch (Exception& e) {
345  FFStreamError ffse(e);
346  GPSTK_THROW(ffse);
347  }
348  satsWritten++;
349  satsLeft--;
350  if(satsWritten==maxSatsPerLine || satsLeft==0) { // output a complete line
351  line += string(60 - line.size(), ' ');
352  line += waveFactString;
353  strm << line << endl;
354  strm.lineNumber++;
355  satsWritten = 0;
356  }
357  vecItr++;
358  }
359  itr++;
360  }
361  }
362  }
363  if (valid & obsTypeValid)
364  {
365  const int maxObsPerLine = 9;
366  int obsWritten = 0;
367  line = ""; // make sure the line contents are reset.
368 
369  vector<RinexObsType>::const_iterator itr = obsTypeList.begin();
370 
371  while (itr != obsTypeList.end())
372  {
373  // the first line needs to have the # of obs
374  if (obsWritten == 0)
375  line = rightJustify(asString(obsTypeList.size()), 6);
376  // if you hit 9, write out the line and start a new one
377  else if ((obsWritten % maxObsPerLine) == 0)
378  {
379  line += numObsString;
380  strm << line << endl;
381  strm.lineNumber++;
382  line = string(6, ' ');
383  }
384  line += rightJustify(convertObsType(*itr), 6);
385  obsWritten++;
386  itr++;
387  }
388  line += string(60 - line.size(), ' ');
389  line += numObsString;
390  strm << line << endl;
391  strm.lineNumber++;
392  }
393  if (valid & intervalValid)
394  {
395  line = rightJustify(asString(interval, 3), 10);
396  line += string(50, ' ');
397  line += intervalString;
398  strm << line << endl;
399  strm.lineNumber++;
400  }
401  if (valid & firstTimeValid)
402  {
403  line = writeTime(firstObs);
404  line += string(48-line.size(),' ');
405  if(firstSystem.system == RinexSatID::systemGPS) line += "GPS";
406  if(firstSystem.system == RinexSatID::systemGlonass) line += "GLO";
407  if(firstSystem.system == RinexSatID::systemGalileo) line += "GAL";
408  line += string(60 - line.size(), ' ');
409  line += firstTimeString;
410  strm << line << endl;
411  strm.lineNumber++;
412  }
413  if (valid & lastTimeValid)
414  {
415  line = writeTime(lastObs);
416  line += string(48-line.size(),' ');
417  if(lastSystem.system == RinexSatID::systemGPS) line += "GPS";
418  if(lastSystem.system == RinexSatID::systemGlonass) line += "GLO";
419  if(lastSystem.system == RinexSatID::systemGalileo) line += "GAL";
420  line += string(60 - line.size(), ' ');
421  line += lastTimeString;
422  strm << line << endl;
423  strm.lineNumber++;
424  }
425  if (valid & markerNumberValid)
426  {
427  line = leftJustify(markerNumber, 20);
428  line += string(40, ' ');
429  line += markerNumberString;
430  strm << line << endl;
431  strm.lineNumber++;
432  }
433  if (valid & receiverOffsetValid)
434  {
435  line = rightJustify(asString(receiverOffset),6);
436  line += string(54, ' ');
437  line += receiverOffsetString;
438  strm << line << endl;
439  strm.lineNumber++;
440  }
441  if (valid & leapSecondsValid)
442  {
443  line = rightJustify(asString(leapSeconds),6);
444  line += string(54, ' ');
445  line += leapSecondsString;
446  strm << line << endl;
447  strm.lineNumber++;
448  }
449  if (valid & commentValid)
450  {
451  vector<string>::const_iterator itr = commentList.begin();
452  while (itr != commentList.end())
453  {
454  line = leftJustify((*itr), 60);
455  line += commentString;
456  strm << line << endl;
457  strm.lineNumber++;
458  itr++;
459  }
460  }
461  if (valid & numSatsValid)
462  {
463  line = rightJustify(asString(numSVs), 6);
464  line += string(54, ' ');
465  line += numSatsString;
466  strm << line << endl;
467  strm.lineNumber++;
468  }
469  if (valid & prnObsValid)
470  {
471  const int maxObsPerLine = 9;
472  map<SatID, vector<int> >::const_iterator itr = numObsForSat.begin();
473  while (itr != numObsForSat.end())
474  {
475  int numObsWritten = 0;
476 
477  vector<int>::const_iterator vecItr = (*itr).second.begin();
478  while (vecItr != (*itr).second.end())
479  {
480  if (numObsWritten == 0)
481  {
482  try {
483  RinexSatID prn((*itr).first);
484  line = string(3, ' ') + prn.toString();
485  }
486  catch (Exception& e) {
487  FFStreamError ffse(e);
488  GPSTK_RETHROW(ffse);
489  }
490  }
491  else if ((numObsWritten % maxObsPerLine) == 0)
492  {
493  line += prnObsString;
494  strm << line << endl;
495  strm.lineNumber++;
496  line = string(6, ' ');
497  }
498  line += rightJustify(asString(*vecItr), 6);
499  ++vecItr;
500  ++numObsWritten;
501  }
502  line += string(60 - line.size(), ' ');
503  line += prnObsString;
504  strm << line << endl;
505  strm.lineNumber++;
506  itr++;
507  }
508  }
509  if (valid & endValid)
510  {
511  line = string(60, ' ');
512  line += endOfHeader;
513  strm << line << endl;
514  strm.lineNumber++;
515  }
516  } // end RinexObsHeader::WriteHeaderRecords()
517 
518 
519  // this function parses a single header record
520  void RinexObsHeader::ParseHeaderRecord(string& line)
521  throw(FFStreamError)
522  {
523  string label(line, 60, 20);
524 
525  if (label == versionString)
526  {
527  version = asDouble(line.substr(0,20));
528 // cout << "R2ObsHeader:ParseHeaderRecord:version = " << version << endl;
529  fileType = strip(line.substr(20, 20));
530  if ( (fileType[0] != 'O') &&
531  (fileType[0] != 'o'))
532  {
533  FFStreamError e("This isn't a Rinex Obs file");
534  GPSTK_THROW(e);
535  }
536  string system_str = strip(line.substr(40, 20));
537  try {
538  system.fromString(system_str);
539  }
540  catch (Exception& e)
541  {
542  FFStreamError ffse("Input satellite system is unsupported: " + system_str);
543  GPSTK_THROW(ffse);
544  }
545  valid |= versionValid;
546  }
547  else if (label == runByString )
548  {
549  fileProgram = strip(line.substr(0, 20));
550  fileAgency = strip(line.substr(20, 20));
551  date = strip(line.substr(40, 20));
552  valid |= runByValid;
553  }
554  else if (label == commentString)
555  {
556  string s = strip(line.substr(0, 60));
557  commentList.push_back(s);
558  valid |= commentValid;
559  }
560  else if (label == markerNameString)
561  {
562  markerName = strip(line.substr(0,60));
563  valid |= markerNameValid;
564  }
565  else if (label == markerNumberString)
566  {
567  markerNumber = strip(line.substr(0,20));
568  valid |= markerNumberValid;
569  }
570  else if (label == observerString)
571  {
572  observer = strip(line.substr(0,20));
573  agency = strip(line.substr(20,40));
574  valid |= observerValid;
575  }
576  else if (label == receiverString)
577  {
578  recNo = strip(line.substr(0, 20));
579  recType = strip(line.substr(20,20));
580  recVers = strip(line.substr(40,20));
581  valid |= receiverValid;
582  }
583  else if (label ==antennaTypeString)
584  {
585  antNo = strip(line.substr(0, 20));
586  antType = strip(line.substr(20, 20));
587  valid |= antennaTypeValid;
588  }
589  else if (label == antennaPositionString)
590  {
591  antennaPosition[0] = asDouble(line.substr(0, 14));
592  antennaPosition[1] = asDouble(line.substr(14, 14));
593  antennaPosition[2] = asDouble(line.substr(28, 14));
594  valid |= antennaPositionValid;
595  }
596  else if (label == antennaOffsetString)
597  {
598  antennaOffset[0] = asDouble(line.substr(0, 14));
599  antennaOffset[1] = asDouble(line.substr(14, 14));
600  antennaOffset[2] = asDouble(line.substr(28, 14));
601  valid |= antennaOffsetValid;
602  }
603  else if (label == waveFactString)
604  {
605  // first time reading this
606  if (! (valid & waveFactValid))
607  {
608  wavelengthFactor[0] = asInt(line.substr(0,6));
609  wavelengthFactor[1] = asInt(line.substr(6,6));
610  valid |= waveFactValid;
611  }
612  // additional wave fact lines
613  else
614  {
615  const int maxSatsPerLine = 7;
616  int Nsats;
617  ExtraWaveFact ewf;
618  ewf.wavelengthFactor[0] = asInt(line.substr(0,6));
619  ewf.wavelengthFactor[1] = asInt(line.substr(6,6));
620  Nsats = asInt(line.substr(12,6));
621 
622  if (Nsats > maxSatsPerLine) // > not >=
623  {
624  FFStreamError e("Invalid number of Sats for " + waveFactString);
625  GPSTK_THROW(e);
626  }
627 
628  for (int i = 0; i < Nsats; i++)
629  {
630  try {
631  RinexSatID prn(line.substr(21+i*6,3));
632  ewf.satList.push_back(prn);
633  }
634  catch (Exception& e){
635  FFStreamError ffse(e);
636  GPSTK_RETHROW(ffse);
637  }
638  }
639 
640  extraWaveFactList.push_back(ewf);
641  }
642  }
643  else if (label == numObsString)
644  {
645  const int maxObsPerLine = 9;
646  // process the first line
647  if (! (valid & obsTypeValid))
648  {
649  numObs = asInt(line.substr(0,6));
650 
651  for (int i = 0; (i < numObs) && (i < maxObsPerLine); i++)
652  {
653  int position = i * 6 + 6 + 4;
654  RinexObsType rt = convertObsType(line.substr(position,2));
655  obsTypeList.push_back(rt);
656  }
657  valid |= obsTypeValid;
658  }
659  // process continuation lines
660  else
661  {
662  for (int i = obsTypeList.size();
663  (i < numObs) && ( (i % maxObsPerLine) < maxObsPerLine); i++)
664  {
665  int position = (i % maxObsPerLine) * 6 + 6 + 4;
666  RinexObsType rt = convertObsType(line.substr(position,2));
667  obsTypeList.push_back(rt);
668  }
669  }
670  }
671  else if (label == intervalString)
672  {
673  interval = asDouble(line.substr(0, 10));
674  valid |= intervalValid;
675  }
676  else if (label == firstTimeString)
677  {
678  firstObs = parseTime(line);
679  firstSystem.system = RinexSatID::systemGPS;
680  if(line.substr(48,3)=="GLO") firstSystem.system=RinexSatID::systemGlonass;
681  if(line.substr(48,3)=="GAL") firstSystem.system=RinexSatID::systemGalileo;
682  valid |= firstTimeValid;
683  }
684  else if (label == lastTimeString)
685  {
686  lastObs = parseTime(line);
687  lastSystem.system = RinexSatID::systemGPS;
688  if(line.substr(48,3)=="GLO") lastSystem.system=RinexSatID::systemGlonass;
689  if(line.substr(48,3)=="GAL") lastSystem.system=RinexSatID::systemGalileo;
690  valid |= lastTimeValid;
691  }
692  else if (label == receiverOffsetString)
693  {
694  receiverOffset = asInt(line.substr(0,6));
695  valid |= receiverOffsetValid;
696  }
697  else if (label == leapSecondsString)
698  {
699  leapSeconds = asInt(line.substr(0,6));
700  valid |= leapSecondsValid;
701  }
702  else if (label == numSatsString)
703  {
704  numSVs = asInt(line.substr(0,6)) ;
705  valid |= numSatsValid;
706  }
707  else if (label == prnObsString)
708  {
709  const int maxObsPerLine = 9;
710  // continuation lines... you have to know what PRN
711  // this is continuing for, hence lastPRN
712  if ((lastPRN.id != -1) &&
713  (numObsForSat[lastPRN].size() != obsTypeList.size()))
714  {
715  for(int i = numObsForSat[lastPRN].size();
716  (i < int(obsTypeList.size())) &&
717  ( (i % maxObsPerLine) < maxObsPerLine); i++)
718  {
719  numObsForSat[lastPRN].push_back(asInt(line.substr((i%maxObsPerLine)*6+6,6)));
720  }
721  }
722  else
723  {
724  try {
725  lastPRN.fromString(line.substr(3,3));
726  }
727  catch (Exception& e) {
728  FFStreamError ffse(e);
729  GPSTK_RETHROW(ffse);
730  }
731  vector<int> numObsList;
732  for(int i = 0;
733  (i < int(obsTypeList.size())) && (i < maxObsPerLine); i++)
734  {
735  numObsList.push_back(asInt(line.substr(i*6+6,6)));
736  }
737 
738  numObsForSat[lastPRN] = numObsList;
739  }
740  valid |= prnObsValid;
741  }
742  else if (label == endOfHeader)
743  {
744  valid |= endValid;
745  }
746  else
747  {
748  FFStreamError e("Unidentified label: " + label);
749  GPSTK_THROW(e);
750  }
751  } // end of RinexObsHeader::ParseHeaderRecord(string& line)
752 
753 
754  // This function parses the entire header from the given stream
755  void RinexObsHeader::reallyGetRecord(FFStream& ffs)
756  throw(std::exception, FFStreamError,
757  gpstk::StringUtils::StringException)
758  {
759  RinexObsStream& strm = dynamic_cast<RinexObsStream&>(ffs);
760 
761  // if already read, just return
762  if (strm.headerRead == true)
763  return;
764 
765  // since we're reading a new header, we need to reinitialize
766  // all our list structures. all the other objects should be ok.
767  // this also applies if we threw an exception the first time we read
768  // the header and are now re-reading it. some of these could be full
769  // and we need to empty them.
770  commentList.clear();
771  wavelengthFactor[0] = wavelengthFactor[1] = 1;
772  extraWaveFactList.clear();
773  obsTypeList.clear();
774  numObsForSat.clear();
775  valid = 0;
776  numObs = 0;
777  lastPRN.id = -1;
778 
779  string line;
780 
781  while (!(valid & endValid))
782  {
783  strm.formattedGetLine(line);
784  StringUtils::stripTrailing(line);
785 
786  if (line.length()==0)
787  {
788  FFStreamError e("No data read");
789  GPSTK_THROW(e);
790  }
791  else if (line.length()<60 || line.length()>80)
792  {
793  FFStreamError e("Invalid line length");
794  GPSTK_THROW(e);
795  }
796 
797  try
798  {
799  ParseHeaderRecord(line);
800  }
801  catch(FFStreamError& e)
802  {
803  GPSTK_RETHROW(e);
804  }
805 
806  } // end while(not end of header)
807 
808  unsigned long allValid;
809  if (version == 2.0) allValid = allValid20;
810  else if (version == 2.1) allValid = allValid21;
811  else if (version == 2.11) allValid = allValid211;
812  else
813  {
814  FFStreamError e("Unknown or unsupported RINEX version " +
815  asString(version));
816  GPSTK_THROW(e);
817  }
818 
819  if ( (allValid & valid) != allValid)
820  {
821  FFStreamError e("Incomplete or invalid header");
822  GPSTK_THROW(e);
823  }
824 
825  // If we get here, we should have reached the end of header line
826  strm.header = *this;
827  strm.headerRead = true;
828 
829  } // end of reallyGetRecord()
830 
831 
832 
833  RinexObsType
834  RinexObsHeader::convertObsType(const string& oneObs)
835  throw(FFStreamError)
836  {
837  RinexObsType ot(RegisteredRinexObsTypes[0]); // Unknown type
838  for(size_t i=0; i<RegisteredRinexObsTypes.size(); i++) {
839  if(RegisteredRinexObsTypes[i].type == oneObs) {
840  ot = RegisteredRinexObsTypes[i];
841  break;
842  }
843  //FFStreamError e("Bad obs type: " + oneObs);
844  //GPSTK_THROW(e);
845  }
846  return ot;
847  }
848  string
849  RinexObsHeader::convertObsType(const RinexObsType& oneObs)
850  throw(FFStreamError)
851  {
852  return oneObs.type;
853  }
854 
855 
856  CommonTime RinexObsHeader::parseTime(const string& line) const
857  {
858  int year, month, day, hour, min;
859  double sec;
860 
861  year = asInt( line.substr(0, 6 ));
862  month = asInt( line.substr(6, 6 ));
863  day = asInt( line.substr(12, 6 ));
864  hour = asInt( line.substr(18, 6 ));
865  min = asInt( line.substr(24, 6 ));
866  sec = asDouble(line.substr(30, 13));
867  return CivilTime(year, month, day, hour, min, sec).convertToCommonTime();
868  }
869 
870  string RinexObsHeader::writeTime(const CommonTime& dt) const
871  {
872  string line;
873  CivilTime civTime(dt);
874  line = rightJustify(asString<short>(civTime.year), 6);
875  line += rightJustify(asString<short>(civTime.month), 6);
876  line += rightJustify(asString<short>(civTime.day), 6);
877  line += rightJustify(asString<short>(civTime.hour), 6);
878  line += rightJustify(asString<short>(civTime.minute), 6);
879  line += rightJustify(asString(civTime.second, 7), 13);
880  return line;
881  }
882 
883  void RinexObsHeader::dump(ostream& s) const
884  {
885  size_t i,j;
886  s << "---------------------------------- REQUIRED ----------------------------------\n";
887  string str;
888  str = system.systemChar();
889  str = str + " (" + system.systemString() + ")";
890  s << "Rinex Version " << fixed << setw(5) << setprecision(2) << version
891  << ", File type " << fileType << ", System " << str << ".\n";
892  s << "Prgm: " << fileProgram << ", Run: " << date << ", By: " << fileAgency << endl;
893  s << "Marker name: " << markerName << ".\n";
894  s << "Obs'r : " << observer << ", Agency: " << agency << endl;
895  s << "Rec#: " << recNo << ", Type: " << recType << ", Vers: " << recVers << endl;
896  s << "Antenna # : " << antNo << ", Type : " << antType << endl;
897  s << "Position (XYZ,m) : " << setprecision(4) << antennaPosition << ".\n";
898  s << "Antenna offset (ENU,m) : " << setprecision(4) << antennaOffset << ".\n";
899  s << "Wavelength factors (default) L1:" << wavelengthFactor[0]
900  << ", L2: " << wavelengthFactor[1] << ".\n";
901  for(i=0; i<extraWaveFactList.size(); i++) {
902  s << "Wavelength factors (extra) L1:"
903  << extraWaveFactList[i].wavelengthFactor[0]
904  << ", L2: " << extraWaveFactList[i].wavelengthFactor[1]
905  << ", for Sats";
906  for(j=0; j<extraWaveFactList[i].satList.size(); j++)
907  s << " " << extraWaveFactList[i].satList[j];
908  s << endl;
909  }
910  s << "Observation types (" << obsTypeList.size() << ") :\n";
911  for(i=0; i<obsTypeList.size(); i++)
912  s << " Type #" << i << " = "
913  << gpstk::RinexObsHeader::convertObsType(obsTypeList[i])
914  << " " << obsTypeList[i].description
915  << " (" << obsTypeList[i].units << ")." << endl;
916  s << "Time of first obs " << (static_cast<CivilTime>(firstObs)).printf("%04Y/%02m/%02d %02H:%02M:%010.7f")
917  << " " << (firstSystem.system==RinexSatID::systemGlonass ? "GLO" :
918  (firstSystem.system==RinexSatID::systemGalileo ? "GAL" : "GPS")) << endl;
919  s << "(This header is ";
920  if((valid & allValid211) == allValid211) s << "VALID 2.11";
921  else if((valid & allValid21) == allValid21) s << "VALID 2.1";
922  else if((valid & allValid20) == allValid20) s << "VALID 2.0";
923  else s << "NOT VALID";
924  s << " Rinex.)\n";
925 
926  if(!(valid & versionValid)) s << " Version is NOT valid\n";
927  if(!(valid & runByValid)) s << " Run by is NOT valid\n";
928  if(!(valid & markerNameValid)) s << " Marker Name is NOT valid\n";
929  if(!(valid & observerValid)) s << " Observer is NOT valid\n";
930  if(!(valid & receiverValid)) s << " Receiver is NOT valid\n";
931  if(!(valid & antennaTypeValid)) s << " Antenna Type is NOT valid\n";
932  if(!(valid & antennaPositionValid)) s << " Ant Position is NOT valid\n";
933  if(!(valid & antennaOffsetValid)) s << " Antenna Offset is NOT valid\n";
934  if(!(valid & waveFactValid)) s << " Wavelength factor is NOT valid\n";
935  if(!(valid & obsTypeValid)) s << " Obs Type is NOT valid\n";
936  if(!(valid & firstTimeValid)) s << " First time is NOT valid\n";
937  if(!(valid & endValid)) s << " End is NOT valid\n";
938 
939  s << "---------------------------------- OPTIONAL ----------------------------------\n";
940  if(valid & markerNumberValid) s << "Marker number : " << markerNumber << endl;
941  if(valid & intervalValid) s << "Interval = "
942  << fixed << setw(7) << setprecision(3) << interval << endl;
943  if(valid & lastTimeValid) s << "Time of last obs "
944  << (static_cast<CivilTime>(lastObs)).printf("%04Y/%02m/%02d %02H:%02M:%010.7f")
945  << " " << (lastSystem.system==RinexSatID::systemGlonass ? "GLO":
946  (lastSystem.system==RinexSatID::systemGalileo ? "GAL" : "GPS")) << endl;
947  if(valid & leapSecondsValid) s << "Leap seconds: " << leapSeconds << endl;
948  if(valid & receiverOffsetValid) s << "Clock offset record is present and offsets "
949  << (receiverOffset?"ARE":"are NOT") << " applied." << endl;
950  if(valid & numSatsValid) s << "Number of Satellites with data : " << numSVs << endl;
951  if(valid & prnObsValid) {
952  s << "SAT ";
953  for(i=0; i<obsTypeList.size(); i++)
954  s << setw(7) << convertObsType(obsTypeList[i]);
955  s << endl;
956  map<SatID, vector<int> >::const_iterator sat_itr = numObsForSat.begin();
957  while (sat_itr != numObsForSat.end()) {
958  vector<int> obsvec=sat_itr->second;
959  s << " " << RinexSatID(sat_itr->first) << " ";
960  for(i=0; i<obsvec.size(); i++) s << " " << setw(6) << obsvec[i];
961  s << endl;
962  sat_itr++;
963  }
964  }
965  if(commentList.size() && !(valid & commentValid)) s << " Comment is NOT valid\n";
966  s << "Comments (" << commentList.size() << ") :\n";
967  for(i=0; i<commentList.size(); i++)
968  s << commentList[i] << endl;
969  s << "-------------------------------- END OF HEADER -------------------------------\n";
970  }
971 
972  // return 1 if type already defined,
973  // 0 if successful
974  // -1 if not successful - invalid input
975  int RegisterExtendedRinexObsType(string t, string d, string u, unsigned int dep)
976  {
977  if(t.empty()) return -1;
978  // throw if t="UN" ?
979  // check that it is not duplicated
980  for(size_t i=0; i<RinexObsHeader::RegisteredRinexObsTypes.size(); i++) {
981  if(RinexObsHeader::RegisteredRinexObsTypes[i].type == t) { return 1; }
982  }
983  RinexObsType ot;
984  if(t.size()>2) t.resize(2,' '); ot.type = stripTrailing(t);
985  if(d.size()>20) d.resize(20,' '); ot.description = stripTrailing(d);
986  if(u.size()>10) u.resize(10,' '); ot.units = stripTrailing(u);
987  ot.depend = dep;
988  RinexObsHeader::RegisteredRinexObsTypes.push_back(ot);
989  return 0;
990  }
991 
992  // Pretty print a list of standard Rinex observation types
993  void DisplayStandardRinexObsTypes(ostream& s)
994  {
995  s << "The list of standard Rinex obs types:\n";
996  s << " OT Description Units\n";
997  s << " -- -------------------- ---------\n";
998  for(size_t i=0; i<RinexObsHeader::StandardRinexObsTypes.size(); i++) {
999  string line;
1000  line = string(" ")+RinexObsHeader::StandardRinexObsTypes[i].type;
1001  line += leftJustify(string(" ")+RinexObsHeader::StandardRinexObsTypes[i].description,21);
1002  line += leftJustify(string(" ")+RinexObsHeader::StandardRinexObsTypes[i].units,11);
1003  s << line << endl;
1004  }
1005  }
1006 
1007  // Pretty print a list of registered extended Rinex observation types
1008  void DisplayExtendedRinexObsTypes(ostream& s)
1009  {
1010  s << "The list of available extended Rinex obs types:\n";
1011  s << " OT Description Units Required input (EP=ephemeris,PS=Rx Position)\n";
1012  s << " -- -------------------- --------- ------------------\n";
1013  for(size_t i=RinexObsHeader::StandardRinexObsTypes.size();
1014  i<RinexObsHeader::RegisteredRinexObsTypes.size(); i++) {
1015  string line;
1016  line = string(" ")+RinexObsHeader::RegisteredRinexObsTypes[i].type;
1017  line += leftJustify(string(" ")+RinexObsHeader::RegisteredRinexObsTypes[i].description,21);
1018  line += leftJustify(string(" ")+RinexObsHeader::RegisteredRinexObsTypes[i].units,11);
1019  for(int j=1; j<=6; j++) {
1020  if(j==3 || j==4) continue;
1021  if(RinexObsHeader::RegisteredRinexObsTypes[i].depend &
1022  RinexObsHeader::StandardRinexObsTypes[j].depend)
1023  line += string(" ")+RinexObsHeader::StandardRinexObsTypes[j].type;
1024  else line += string(" ");
1025  }
1026  if(RinexObsHeader::RegisteredRinexObsTypes[i].depend & RinexObsType::EPdepend)
1027  line += string(" EP"); else line += string(" ");
1028  if(RinexObsHeader::RegisteredRinexObsTypes[i].depend & RinexObsType::PSdepend)
1029  line += string(" PS"); else line += string(" ");
1030  s << line << endl;
1031  }
1032  }
